tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensitive_loan_data (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_name VARCHAR(50),
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  loan_approval_date DATE,
  sensitive_info BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    loan_type TEXT,
    encrypted_data VARCHAR
);
